Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Indicates if a worker is assigned to a task

Name: include_feature_in_sprint
Description: Whether a feature is selected for current sprint

Name: start_new_sprint
Description: Decide to initiate a new sprint cycle

Name: estimate_story_points
Description: Estimated story points for a user story

Name: resolve_blocker
Description: Decision to resolve a blocker immediately

Name: adjust_velocity_prediction
Description: Modify predicted velocity based on trends

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: Set length of sprint in days

Name: deploy_snapshot_after_sprint
Description: Decide whether to deploy development snapshot
